channel.title: AI Development Tools on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in AI Development Tools on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Developers joke about “coding like cavemen” as AI service suffers major outage
item.description: Anthropic outage takes down AI tools some developers rely on to create software.

item.title: Microsoft ends OpenAI exclusivity in Office, adds rival Anthropic
item.description: Microsoft will end OpenAI’s exclusive hold on its productivity suite, adding second AI supplier.

item.title: Claude’s new AI file creation feature ships with deep security risks built in
item.description: Expert calls security advice “unfairly outsourcing the problem to Anthropic’s users.”

item.title: ChatGPT’s new branching feature is a good reminder that AI chatbots aren’t people
item.description: Users can explore multiple paths without losing their original chat thread.

item.title: OpenAI launches GPT-5 free to all ChatGPT users
item.description: New model claims fewer confabulations, better coding, and “safe completions” approach.

item.title: AI in Wyoming may soon use more electricity than state’s human residents
item.description: Proposed datacenter would demand 5x Wyoming’s current power use at full deployment.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT Agent casually clicks through “I am not a robot” verification test
item.description: “This step is necessary to prove I’m not a bot,” wrote the bot as it passed an anti-AI screening step.

item.title: Two major AI coding tools wiped out user data after making cascading mistakes
item.description: “I have failed you completely and catastrophically,” wrote Gemini.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: Exhausted man defeats AI model in world coding championship
item.description: “Humanity has prevailed (for now!),” writes winner after 10-hour coding marathon against OpenAI.

item.title: ChatGPT’s new AI agent can browse the web and create PowerPoint slideshows
item.description: New “agentic” AI feature combines web browsing with task-execution abilities.
